Address.value: 2005 CARGO ROAD, MINNEAPOLIS, Minnesota, 55450, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sun Country Airlines Holdings Inc operates low-cost air carriers. The business has two operating segments: Passenger and Cargo. The passenger segment has two internal passenger groups Scheduled and Charter.The Cargo segment provides air cargo services. The majority of the revenue is from the passenger segment.

value.name: Gregory A. Mays
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
